title: Bubba Has No Gall (Bladder) | Daily Best of August 24 | Rick & Bubba
description:
After suffering abdominal pain and being taken to the hospital for tests, Bubba finds out he needs to have surgery to remove his gallbladder. Senator Tommy Tuberville joins us to talk inflation and football. And speaking of football, Alabama Coach Nick Saban secures a new $93M contract making him the highest-paid coach in college football.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
